website_summaries.verdict: This classic rooster weathervane moves freely and adds a rustic accent to your home.
pros: Constructed from of 16 gauge steel.Stainless steel sealed

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and well made
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this wind vane a few days ago and I am very pleased with the quality and craftsmanship. It is well- balanced, and the ball bearings are of good quality- the wind cups move with just the slightest breeze. We did clear-coat it as recommended in the instructions. Came with the roof mount which was nice- no extra purchase necessary. Excellent value
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: Magnificent Rooster Weathervane
customer_reviews.text: I love it! This rooster weathervane is perfect for my shed and it looks beautiful. It actually turns, even the rooster turns. Depending on the direction of the wind sometimes it's hard to see from a distance. It will probably look better in the winter since I have a lot of trees around and weathervane blends in. I needed a handyman to install it for me so it's not something I could install on my own.
customer_reviews.author: Thinking Ape

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality Workmanship & Materials
customer_reviews.text: One star was given to express dissatisfaction with the materials and workmanship of this product. I purposely waited a reasonable length of time before submitting a review to assess function and durability after being exposed to the elements (mild California climate). Within 90 days the finish had begun to peel and visible corrosion appeared. Even with use of a quality lubricant the moving parts move either erradicately or lock up altogether. The old adage "you get what you pay for" comes to mind, but in this case it's more like "if it looks too good (or priced) to be true, it probably is". Either way the end result was very disappointing. Do not recommend for use outdoors.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Moulton

customer_reviews.title: Happy wife, happy life.
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves it. It’s easy to assemble and install. I clear coated it as recommended in the instructions. I should have originally assembled it and sprayed it standing up because when I sprayed the individual parts laying down bubbles formed on the under side. I had to use mineral spirits to clean up the mess and I resprayed it standing up. But if it requires clear coating why isn’t it shipped that way?
customer_reviews.author: Ergo sum

customer_reviews.title: The perfect finishing touch! And excellent customer service!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this to top our chicken coop and it added the perfect finishing touch! It is well made and easy to put together and install. The size is just right, and can be seen easily from the ground. Upon receiving the order from Amazon we opened it to find one of the wind cups had broken off. Its a super delicate piece and could have easily broken during shipping. I emailed the company and they sent a new one out right away, free of charge. I will definitely recommend them or buy again if we have the need. Many other designs available as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kiryn Pasricha

customer_reviews.title: Nicely made
customer_reviews.text: Very nice smallish weathervane. I put mine on my storage shed. I did a small paint job and added a red-white&blue theme. Appears well made and looks great. Easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: David Morgan

customer_reviews.title: It was easy to install and the mounting bracket that came with ...
customer_reviews.text: My wife has been wanting a weather-vane for a long time. She loves this one. It was easy to install and the mounting bracket that came with it is sturdy and fit the roof pitch perfectly. In my case it was not necessary to purchase a heavy duty adjustable mounting bracket.
customer_reviews.author: Lift Guy

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little hesitant to buy it because it didn't say what size it is. It's a little smaller than I expected, but not bad. It looks like it's probably about 28-30" tall (hard to tell exactly since I didn't measure before mounting it). It looks good on my 12x12 shed. I also like the little cups that spin even in the slightest wind. It seems well-built.
customer_reviews.author: mjd

customer_reviews.title: No Need for Directions!
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely adore this navigational beauty in our yard. We made a directional sign, and put this atop the pole that shows where all of our favorite places are...and this weathervane is the icing on the cake.! If you're looking for the perfect topper for your home, garden, chicken coop - just about anywhere you'd like this ornamental beaut - look no further. We're SUPER pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Tristesse McLeod

customer_reviews.title: It was easy to install and functions perfectly
customer_reviews.text: This weathervane has pride of place on my son's chicken coop. It was easy to install and functions perfectly. We really like its classic look, not sure what the chickens think about it. So far the real rooster in the flock has not taken offense.
customer_reviews.author: Helene

customer_reviews.title: Great copper color but doesn’t show up at a distance.
customer_reviews.text: This is s great rooster but looks really small even on a single car garage. The copper color is awesome close up but doesn’t show well at all in the distance. I would actually recommend a larger darker one.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: very pleased
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift and ended up being installed on my granddaughter's chicken coop by her 10 year old brother. He had no problems, so it should be a breeze for an adult. Quality was reported to us as very good.
customer_reviews.author: Sheffield Bill

customer_reviews.title: Decent for the price
customer_reviews.text: It's ok. It's smaller than I expected but not bad. The vane on mine doesn't move very freely in the wind. it does move but it needs more wind than should be needed. It's not expensive so it's acceptable.
customer_reviews.author: troia

customer_reviews.title: Help the confused chickens
customer_reviews.text: The chickens had a difficult time determining directions so i added this to the cupola—- problem solved
customer_reviews.author: cdcats8

customer_reviews.title: Perfect add on to any coop or shed
customer_reviews.text: Perfect addition to my new coop. Made up really nice not flimsy. Spins freely with the slightest of wind
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Good value. Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I love everything this weather vane ! It has withstood high winds and rain. It is sturdy and a great value for the quality. It sits on top of a chicken coop and is the perfect size.
customer_reviews.author: Diane ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Works very well and beautiful detail
customer_reviews.text: We love our Rootie! Works very well and beautiful detail - which is why I bought this one instead of others I had seen. We actually have it on top of our antennae and it looks lovely up there.

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again!

customer_reviews.title: Weathervane
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for Fathers Day as a gift for my husband, and he loved it! He is very hard to shop for so I was excited when I found this. It has a very nice finish on it so I think it will be around for years to come!

customer_reviews.title: looks great
customer_reviews.text: It looks terrific on the top of my house. I sprayed it with clear coat to maintain durability. Its a good deal considering the other choices were significantly more expensive.

customer_reviews.title: Father's Day
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for Father's Day to replace a windmill that had lost several of it's pieces. My father liked the weather vane very much and we installed it the same day. It looks just like the picture and was a good purchase.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This is a good weather vane. I put it on the roof of a two story shed and it has been through a few storms this winter. It still works great. If I had it to do over, I would paint it a different color. There are tall trees in back of it and it is hard to see. Black might be OK in front of a blue sky, but one seldom looks at the weather vane when the sky's are blue. White would be a better color.
customer_reviews.author: Plain Servant

customer_reviews.title: Very acceptable as advertised, but metal was disappointingly light ...
customer_reviews.text: Very acceptable as advertised, but metal was disappointingly light weight so may not last as long as we expected. As this was a gift we did not have time to exchange or return. Something to be careful of.
